abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Guangdong Pearl
            River Delta Urban Environment Project for China is to assist
            in addressing the environmental problems of the Pearl River
            Delta in Guangdong province and the South China Sea, through
            the improvement and rationalization of environmental service
            delivery based on a regional planning approach. The
            restructuring will increase the disbursement percentage for
            category one (a) (civil works related to the wastewater
            management component) from 50 percent to 100 percent. This
            increase will enable the undisbursed balance of the loan to
            be fully disbursed and alleviate counterpart funding
            shortages. The loan closing date is being extended by 16
            months enable Guangzhou Sewage Treatment Company (GSTC) to
            complete all ongoing and planned works for the sewer network
            and hazard waste management facility. The closing date for
            the project will be extended from August 31, 2010 until
            December 31, 2011.
